fields.label: Home Page Builder
fields.name: acf_homepage_builder
fields.instructions: Add and rearrange rows here to change the layout of your homepage

sub_fields.label: Lightbox?
sub_fields.name: hero_slider_lightbox
sub_fields.instructions:
Open the button link in a lightbox?
Good for YouTube videos

sub_fields.label: Hero Image Title
sub_fields.name: hero_block_title
sub_fields.instructions: This will be shown in big letters, outside the caption

sub_fields.label: Hero Title Font Size
sub_fields.name: hero_block_title_size
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the size of the title font (you may want to experiment to see which size works best)

sub_fields.label: Hero CTA lightbox?
sub_fields.name: hero_cta_lightbox
sub_fields.instructions:
Open this link in a lightbox?
(Good for YouTube videos)

sub_fields.label: Custom CSS class
sub_fields.name: image_text_class
sub_fields.instructions: Useful for custom CSS styling if there's more than one of these used on the page

sub_fields.label: Custom CSS class
sub_fields.name: text_image_class
sub_fields.instructions: Useful for custom CSS styling if there's more than one of these used on the page

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: acf_fl_3_mpu_section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: Put a title here for this section.

sub_fields.label: No Gap between columns?
sub_fields.name: acf_fl_3_mpu_collapse
sub_fields.instructions: Select if you don't want to have a gutter/padding inbetween the columns

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: acf_fl_4_mpu_section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: Put a title here for this section.

sub_fields.label: No Gap between columns?
sub_fields.name: acf_fl_4_mpu_collapse
sub_fields.instructions: Select if you don't want to have a gutter/padding inbetween the columns

sub_fields.label: Add box
sub_fields.name: flexbox_wysi_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: You cannot add more than 6 boxes per row.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: flexbox_wysi_bg
sub_fields.instructions: Choose from one of the preset colours. See the Style Guide page for your colours.

sub_fields.label: CSS class
sub_fields.name: flexbox_wysi_css_class
sub_fields.instructions: Advanced use only - to target the styling for this box

sub_fields.label: CSS class
sub_fields.name: flex_wysi_wrap_css_class
sub_fields.instructions: For advanced styling only

sub_fields.label: Strapline
sub_fields.name: acf_strapline
sub_fields.instructions: Keep this very short so it fits nicely on one line.

sub_fields.label: Fancy Quote marks?
sub_fields.name: acf_strapline_quotes
sub_fields.instructions: Tick the box if you want the site to automatically put decorative quote marks before and after the text.

sub_fields.label: Testimonials Title
sub_fields.name: testimonials_title
sub_fields.instructions: Change the text here if you would rather the title displayed on the site is something like 'what people say about us' instead.

sub_fields.label: Quotes
sub_fields.name: quotes
sub_fields.instructions:
Add in Quotes here and drag/drop them to change the order they appear in. 
Do not include the speech marks in each testimonial, they are added automatically.

sub_fields.label: Testimonial quote
sub_fields.name: acf_flexible_layout_testimonial_quote
sub_fields.instructions: Best to restrict it to a few sentences.

sub_fields.label: Testimonial source
sub_fields.name: acf_flexible_layout_testimonial_source
sub_fields.instructions: (Optional) add in the name of the person the quote is attributed to.

sub_fields.label: Text introduction
sub_fields.name: acf_home_logo_text
sub_fields.instructions: Optional. Could say something like 'we are supported by:'

sub_fields.label: Logo Images
sub_fields.name: acf_home_logo_images
sub_fields.instructions: Upload small versions of logos.

sub_fields.label: How to Use
sub_fields.message:
This will output the contents of the Home Page Widget Area. Add widgets into it via Dashboard> Appearance>Widgets 
Useful when used in combination with Genesis Featured Post Combo plugin.

sub_fields.label: Custom HTML
sub_fields.name: custom_acf_row_html
sub_fields.instructions: Probably best to start with a <section > then <div class="container >
